addParticipant.title: Add New Participant
addParticipant.description: Fill in the details below to create a new user.

validate.firstNameLetters: First name must contain only letters
validate.lastNameLetters: Last name must contain only letters
validate.emailValid: Please enter a valid email address
validate.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validate.phoneValid: Please enter a valid phone number
validate.ageValid: Age must be a valid number
validate.ageRange: Please enter a valid age between 1 and 120
validate.cinFormat: CIN must be in the format 'AB123456789'
